name: Fun Race Ninja Kids - by Fun Games For Free
name_original: Fun Race Ninja Kids - by Fun Games For Free
description:
Beat your Friends on the most EXCITING RUNNER game on the Appstore. Play online against your Friends and show them who's the fastest Ninja!

- Swipe to ESCAPE from obstacles
- JUMP to avoid blocks
- DUCK to avoid being hit
- ATTACK you opponents with incredible powerups!
- RACE as fast as possible!
- Very EASY CONTROLS (swipe and touch Screen)
